description_en: A specialized form of grenade launcher, a minelayer surrounds its ordnance with a cushioning magnetic field. Grenades must be loaded into a minelayer individually, and a user can decide which grenade to fire with each shot. A merc minelayer holds up to 8 grenades at once, a squad model holds 12, a platoon version can carry up to 16, and the command minelayer can hold an impressive 20 grenades.
